title: Complete Campaign Guide
description: Optimized order for Expert/Heroic difficulty with card pool building strategy.

criticalNotes.title: ‚ö†Ô∏è Critical Notes
criticalNotes.note1: Building card pool between campaigns is CRITICAL for Expert success
criticalNotes.note2: Galaxy's Most Wanted is LAST - extremely punishing (Ronan 26% win rate)
criticalNotes.note3: Rise of Red Skull is the must play #1 expansion recommended by community after Core
criticalNotes.note4: Expert difficulty scales with card pool size - more options = more manageable
criticalNotes.note5: Wrecking Crew ONLY for completionists - community says "you don't need it"
